meanings: take a drive in the countryside[outside of town]

vlive.korean: [냉면 - 명카드라이브] - 여름이다! - 여름이다! ["Naengmyeon" - Myung-ca Drive] - It's summer! - It's summer! 듣기 View video OSEN : 여자친구, 마이크 받자마자 텐션 폭발한 썰 #스타로드 01
vlive.english: ["Naengmyeon" - Myung-ca Drive] - It's summer! - It's summer!

vlive.korean: 제가 봤을 때 이거는 드라이브 송 완전! It'll be perfect from driving! 듣기 View video BTS : 슙디의 꿀 FM 06.13 with RM #0613FM_0502
차 드라이브 데이트한 적 없다 그랬나? So you've never been on a date who has a car? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 🧡 찐 이상형을 만나면 굳어버린단 말이야 ! [오늘부터 찐한 사이] EP05 #오찐사
vlive.english: So you've never been on a date who has a car?

vlive.korean: 뭔가 드라이브 하면서 들을 것 같지 않아요? Doesn't it seem like you're going to listen to it while going on a drive? 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 🌙
vlive.english: Doesn't it seem like you're going to listen to it while going on a drive?

vlive.korean: 오픈카 타고 드라이브 하면서 들을 것 같은 노래? It's a great song to listen to while you take a drive in an open car. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TXT] 단짝즈 투플리 내 심장에 채워놨어.. 🎶🗝️ (SOOBIN&BEOMGYU recommending songs)
vlive.english: It's a great song to listen to while you take a drive in an open car.

examples.korean: Their first album was titled ‘Ocean Drive’. 발음듣기 그들의 첫 앨범에는 ‘오션 드라이브’라는 제목이 붙어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Their first album was titled ‘Ocean Drive’. 발음

examples.korean: 21 Island Heights Drive 발음듣기 아일랜드 하이츠 드라이브 21번지 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
a drive-time radio show 발음듣기 드라이브 타임 라디오 프로 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
She has a strong forehand drive. 발음듣기 그녀는 포핸드 드라이브가 강력하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has a strong forehand drive. 발음

examples.korean: We stopped at a drive-in for a hamburger. 발음듣기 우리는 햄버거를 사러 드라이브 인에 들렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We stopped at a drive-in for a hamburger. 발음
